flashCards.backText: Vue is a JavaScript framework for building SPAs.
Nuxt is a meta-framework that uses Vue to build Webpages that can be rendered on the client and the server
Pinia is the current gold-standard state management library for Vue. Simpler than VueX

flashCards.frontText: What are the lifecycle methods in Vue?
flashCards.backText: setup, beforeCreate, onCreated, beforeMount, onMount, beforeUpdate, onUpdate, beforeUnmount, onUnmounted
